name: Verdant (GGJ - Ver 1.1)
description:
CONTROLS
WASD - Movement
SHIFT (HOLD) - Sneak
CTRL (HOLD) - Hide
E - Interact
Q - Throw Rock

Verdant is a stealth, puzzle horror game. You play as the last of the tree folk who have horribly been taken over and drained by a sinister force. Avoid detection by using your wits and cunning. Activate flowers indicated by their light, and open doors throughout the dungeon. Make your way to the Elder Tree and save your home.

(p.s this was made in a 48 hour jam, the level is not completed but is a demonstration of the game concept.)
